name: VentricularSeptalDefectDisordersSNOMED
title: Ventricular septal defect (Disorders) (SNOMED)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnoses or problems that represent that the patient has Ventricular septal defect regardless of the clinical presentation of the condition),(Data Element Scope: Diagnoses or problems documented in a clinical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: Ventricular septal defect),(Exclusion Criteria: Ventricular septal defects that occur as part of Tetralogy of Fallot or an atrioventricular septal defect.  Inflow-type, subtricuspid, and canal-type VSDs)
